explains: v. 洗涤；洗黑钱（launder 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: Investigators are looking at what they believe may be the largest money-laundering scandal in history.
sentences.cn: 调查者们正在研究他们认为可能是史上最大的一起洗钱丑闻。

sentences.en: The investigators have uncovered paperwork that ties the suspect to the money laundering scheme.
sentences.cn: 调查人员已经发现了与疑似洗钱计划有关的文件。

sentences.en: Some uniforms are also expensive to maintain, requiring professional dry cleaning rather than the home laundering possible with many types of civilian clothes.
sentences.cn: 一些制服的维护费用也很昂贵，它们需要专业的干洗，而不是与许多类型的便服一样在家里清洗。
